page.title: 13EVENTS,MADDERTY
page.content: In 1968 the{Abbey Church}celebrated its{300th anniversary}by holding a big Fete. With the money raised the church was renovated inside and out. The chuch members did all the outside work themselves. In 1976 the{Crown Prince of Japan and {his wife Princess Michiko visited {Madderty Primary}School.Lord and Lady Mansfield accompanied them. They presented the school with an Origami kit and a Red Cross scrap book made by school- children in Tokyo. In March 1984{a fierce gale}blew through this area. Many huge trees were blown down blocking roads. A beautiful wood near the village of St.David's was blown down. A lovely place, called The Lady's Walk, where people used to go for a walk,was destroyed.
